$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/Common/Settings.caption: Evidently Cube
$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/Common/Settings.text:
! Evidently Cube plugins Settings

Below are settings for all Evidently Cube plugins.

<$macrocall tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EvidentlyCube/SettingsTab]!is[draft]sort[]]"default={{{[[$:/tags/EvidentlyCube/SettingsTab]tagging[]!is[draft]sort[]nth[]]}}}$name=tabs/>

$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/AutoComplete/hi.text:
* ''1.0.18'': ** Fixed RSOD in TW 5.3.0+ caused by new API not being supported ** Fixed RSOD when earlier keyup causes the focus to be changed -- can be triggered by setting `sidebar-search` shortcut to the same key as manually triggering auto complete. * ''1.0.17'' -- Variable `editedTiddler` can now be used in //Suggestion Filter// and //Display Filter// * ''1.0.16'' -- The two `

` tags that were wrapping around the auto complete window have been reduced to a single `

` tag. * ''1.0.15'': ** ''Code Mirror integration:'' No longer throws an exception when triggering completion in non-codemirror input when codemirror editor is opened ** ''Code Mirror integration:'' Completion opens at the correct position even when window is scrolled ** ''Code Mirror integration:'' No longer throws an exception when selecting an option with mouse in non-codemirror input when codemirror editor is opened * ''1.0.14'': ** Fixed a bug where navigating through auto completion would still trigger TW's keyboard widgets eg. navigating auto completion in sidebar search would also change selected search result ** The list of suggestion can now be scrolled down using the keyboard. * ''1.0.13'' -- Added caption to triggers to improve how they are displayed in the settings * ''1.0.12'' -- Various small fixes and tweaks to problems introduced between 1.0.9 and 1.0.11. * ''1.0.11'' -- This plugin now takes preference over `codemirror-autocomplete` and will prevent the code mirror Auto Complete from opening at the same time as this * ''1.0.10'' -- No longer crashes when using together with a Twitter plugin or any other plugin which delays the execution of the `startup` module * ''1.0.9'' -- Using mouse for Auto Complete now works in tiddlers opened in a separate window * ''1.0.8'' -- Auto Complete now works gracefully with `codemirror-closebrackets` plugin * ''1.0.7'' -- Auto Complete now only opens in the window in which it was invoked when using Side Editor plugin or just opening a tiddler in a new window * ''1.0.6'': ** If you use Auto Complete in a text area that is scrolled, Auto Complete window will now be correctly positioned. ** If you use framed editor but the main window was scrolled, Auto Complete window will now be correctly positioned ** Fixed incorrect placeholder for description field ** Changed the default trigger slightly * ''1.0.5'' -- Auto Complete now also opens in tiddlers opened in a new window * ''1.0.4'' -- Added `Transform Filter` option to triggers which allows transforming the suggestion before it is inserted (eg to insert a field value instead) * ''1.0.3'' -- Added compatibility with Streams - this plugin's Enter takes priority over Streams's Enter * ''1.0.2'' -- Upped version because issue * ''1.0.1'' -- Added `z-index` to CSS so the completion always (tries to) appear at the top * ''1.0.0'' -- Initial release

$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/AutoComplete/re.text:
[[Github|https://github.com/EvidentlyCube/TW5-PluginShowcase/tree/main/plugins/EvidentlyCube/TW5-AutoComplete]]

---
! Features

A versatile and easy to use auto completion for TiddlyWiki:

* Auto complete anything you want:
** Tiddler titles
** Field values
** Any filter result
* Define your own triggers
** Customize the filter which retrieves the suggestions
** Customize template used for inserting the selected suggestion
** Customize how the suggestions are displayed in the completion window
** Control auto-triggering separately for inputs and text areas
* Clear interface for editing the triggers
* Manually open auto complete with customizable keyboard shortcut

!! Plugin compatibility

* Official [[Code Mirror|https://tiddlywiki.com/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror/]] plugin
 * [[Streams|https://saqimtiaz.github.io/streams/]] by saqimtiaz

! How to use

* After installing head to the Control Panel and open the tab ''Evidently Cube''
* Create a new trigger using the button
** It will be filled with sensible defaults
** Customize the trigger to your heart's content
* At any time press <kbd>Ctrl+Space</kbd> right in front of a defined trigger to open the completion window manually
** Or use a different keyboard shortcut you defined

$:/config/ShortcutInfo/EC-AutoComplete.text: Triggers completion of Auto Complete plugin

$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/AutoComplete/Se.caption: Auto Complete
$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/AutoComplete/Se.text:
\define action-new-trigger() <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{[[$:/tags/EC/AutoComplete/Trigger]tagging[]!is[draft]count[]add[1]addprefix[$:/EvidentlyCube/Trigger/]]}}}tags="$:/tags/EC/AutoComplete/Trigger"caption={{{[[$:/tags/EC/AutoComplete/Trigger]tagging[]!is[draft]count[]add[1]addprefix[Unnamed trigger ]]}}}trigger=[[ filter="[all[tiddlers]!is[system]!is[draft]search:title]"display-filter="[]"template=[[$option$]]$caret$ auto-trigger-textarea=1> <$action-navigate $to=<>scroll=yes/> \end \define action-open-keyboard-shortcuts()<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab-1749438307"text="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts"/> \define comp-open-keyboard-shortcuts() <$button class="tc-tiddlylink tc-tiddlylink-resolves ec_ac-pointer"actions=<>tag=a>Keyboard Shortcuts \end Configuration for the [[Auto Complete|$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/AutoComplete]] plugin. ! Registered Triggers
    <$list filter='[[$:/tags/EC/AutoComplete/Trigger]tagging[]!is[draft]sortan[title]sortan[caption]]'>
  • <$link><$view field=caption><$view field=title/> (Trigger {{!!trigger}})
  • <$button actions=<>>Create a new trigger
! Config
''Displayed results''
//Maximum number of results to display in the auto complete window, must be between 1 and 99// 		<$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/AutoComplete/Config'field=rows default=8/> <$list filter='[{$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/AutoComplete/Config!!rows}floor[]compare:number:lt[1]][{$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/AutoComplete/Config!!rows}floor[]compare:number:gt[99]]+[count[]!match[0]]'>
Must be a number between 1 and 99
''Keyboard Shortcut''
//Use this keyboard shortcut right in front of a trigger to manually open the completion window; can be changed in <>tab// 		<$list filter='$:/config/shortcuts/ $:/config/shortcuts-mac/ $:/config/shortcuts-not-mac/ $:/config/shortcuts-linux/ $:/config/shortcuts-not-linux/ $:/config/shortcuts-windows/ $:/config/shortcuts-not-windows/'> <$macrocall $output='text/html'shortcuts={{{[{!!title}addsuffix[EC-AutoComplete]get[text]]}}}prefix=''separator=' 'suffix=''$name=displayshortcuts/>

$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/AutoComplete/te.text:
\define must-be-defined(field name) <$list filter="[{!!$field$}match[]]"> $name$ must be defined \end \define must-be-valid-filter(field) <$let base-filter={{!!$field$}}suffix=" +[limit[1]]"filter={{{[addsuffix]}}}> <$list filter=<>> <$list filter={{{[{!!title}prefix[Filter error]]}}}> <$text text={{!!title}}/> \end

Auto complete trigger

This tiddler defines a trigger for Auto Complete plugin.

''Caption:''

Optional caption displayed in the Control Panel instead of the tiddler name

<$edit-text class=ec-tc-disabled field=caption default=''placeholder=Caption.../>
''Description:''

A description of this trigger to make it easier to keep things clean.

<$edit-text class=ec-tc-disabled default=''placeholder='Description for this trigger...'field=text/>
''Trigger:''

Defines the text which will trigger auto completion.
For example `[[` will cause the auto completion to appear after you type `[[` in any text field.

<$edit-text class=ec-tc-disabled field=trigger placeholder=Trigger.../> <$list filter='[[$:/tags/EC/AutoComplete/Trigger]tagging[]field:trigger{!!trigger}]-[{!!title}]+[nth[]]'> Trigger already used in: <> <>
''Suggestion Filter:''

This filter generates the list of options that will be displayed in the auto completion.
Use variable `query` to inject the typed text.
Variable `` contains the name of the tiddler that is being modified by the widget that triggered auto completion.

<$edit-text class=ec-tc-disabled tag=textarea field=filter placeholder=Filter.../> <> <>
''Display Filter:''

Advanced feature!
Transforms how the suggestion will be displayed in auto complete window.
`` contains the suggestion being displayed.
Variable `` contains the name of the tiddler that is being modified by the widget that triggered auto completion.

<$edit-text class=ec-tc-disabled tag=textarea placeholder='Display filter...'field=display-filter/> <> <>
''Transform Filter:''

Advanced feature!
Transform the selected suggestion before it's inserted.
It's useful when you want to insert tiddler's text or data indexes.
`` contains the suggestion selected.

<$edit-text class=ec-tc-disabled tag=textarea placeholder='[]'field=transform-filter/> <>
''Template:''

A template that is inserted when you select an option from auto completion.
`$option$` will be replaced by the selected option.
`$caret$` will put the caret on that position after insertion.

<$edit-text class=ec-tc-disabled field=template placeholder=Template.../> <>
''Auto trigger on Inputs:''

If checked auto completion will automatically open as soon as you type the ''trigger'' in a single-line text input.
Otherwise you need to open it manually with a keyboard shortcut.

<$checkbox field=auto-trigger-input checked=1> Auto trigger on Inputs
''Auto trigger on Text Areas:''

If checked auto completion will automatically open as soon as you type the ''trigger'' in a multi-line text input.
Otherwise you need to open it manually with a keyboard shortcut.

<$checkbox field=auto-trigger-textarea checked=1> Auto trigger on Text Areas

Test the filter

<$let temp=<>rows={{{[{$:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/AutoComplete/Config!!rows}floor[]!match[0]else[8]min[99]max[1]]}}}default-transform-filter='[]'filter-suffix=' +[limit]'display-filter={{!!display-filter}}transform-filter={{{[{!!transform-filter}!match[]else]}}}filter={{{[{!!filter}addsuffix]}}}> ''Query:'' <$edit-text tag=input class=ec-tc-disabled tiddler=<>field=query default=''placeholder=Test.../>

Only the first <> results will be displayed.

<$let query={{{[get[query]]}}}editedTiddler=<>> <$list filter=<>emptyMessage='
Suggestion Displays as After insertion
No results'>
<$text text={{{[{!!title}]}}}/> <$text text={{{[{!!title}subfilter]}}}/> <$text text={{{[{!!title}subfilter]}}}/>
